name: loki-theme/magento2-luma-components
description: Module to allow for Loki Themes to work

suggest.mage-os/module-alpine-loader: Load Alpine.js in the Luma frontend
suggest.mage-os/module-alpine-local-storage: Sync LocalStorage via an Alpine.js store
suggest.mage-os/module-alpine-messages: Replace Luma messages with an Alpine.js component
suggest.mage-os/module-alpine-minicart: Replace Luma minicart with an Alpine.js component
